website_summaries.verdict: A quality tool by a top manufacturer that's built for convenience and can tackle numerous wood-working tasks.
pros: Woodworkers and precision craftsman favor the saw’s control and precision
3-position orbital settings add to its versatility
cons: Mixed feedback on the battery life - some owners rave about it, others wish it were longer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, as usual.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Been waiting for a project that I would need a jigsaw for. Does not disappoint. Went with this one vice the newer style brushless version because of the aggravation I read in the reviews about how the other model does some kind of slow control, load dependent start. Plus this one was less expensive. Came with some blades...a couple metal cutting ones and some different sized blades for wood. Been absurdly pleased with Makita tools, this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality tool!
customer_reviews.text: This jigsaw is a pleasure to use. I used it to cut this bowpress because I didn’t want to try to wrestle it through the bandsaw as it’s 8 feet long. It was easy to stay on the line and get a smooth cut, and I didn’t even need a cord!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Best jigsaw.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic jigsaw. As good as a corded Bosch but this is better because it's cordless and the led light is extremely helpful. It's my second one because I didn't want to keep going to the work truck when I needed one in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Good saw but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like this saw. It is a bit heavier than I thought it would be. Still irks me the the Makita cordless jigsaw one of the most expensive ones on the market. I wanted to stick with Makita since I already had the batteries. It seems to be well built and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Bennetsen

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: After some trouble with an older jigsaw, we decided to add another product of the Makita cordless family to our selection. It’s grab and go. I recommend getting two batteries. They recharge quickly and you will have the jigsaw ready to start and end your job without wait time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Safty
customer_reviews.text: As for the start of the saw you need to push the top button then pull the trigger as a professional this is a device that is unneeded. . Also I feel the saw is in control of me and I'm not in control of the saw reason as you pull the trigger it starts slow and will only begin to pick up speed as it receives pressure from the material I should be able to control the speed not the saw
customer_reviews.author: I C U doing that

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Makita Cordless Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I bought the bare tool and already have 5 AH batteries from other Makita tools. Easy blade change and long run times. Buy spare bag and blades.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Good basic jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: We are a small electrical contractor and use this saw mostly for cutting holes in plywood for electrical boxes. It works perfectly for that and the included makita blades are very sharp and work well (a month later and we are still using the same blade). If I wanted to do complex woodworking in a set location like a shop, I would go with a corded model that had more features, but for being able to pack this around in a work van and cut holes in a cabinet or wall, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dynamice

customer_reviews.title: Super Sabre Saw
customer_reviews.text: This is a joy to use! It is so versatile, powerful, and solid I don't know how I lived without it. The blades are super easy to change. The oscillation is activated by pressure. This saw easily cuts through 2 bys and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more cords great power and portability
customer_reviews.text: I recently put this unit to the test cutting out a couple kitchen sinks and was highly impressed it cut through like the corded tool. Loved not having to deal with a cord lying around and so nice to have a lightweight tool for cornering. I will say there is lack of dust clearing from the cutting view but i'll deal with that considering the advantages.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Young

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this tool. I am a professional finish carpenter and I use this every day. It has a light, a fan, it cuts well and is accurate and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Good Jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good jigsaw for the money. The RPMs are a little lower than I would like, but the portability from being battery powered makes the loss in rpms acceptable. The trigger response and variable speeds are very nice, and the blade changes are very easy. The only complaint I have is that the plastic guard on the stage of the saw does not stay on, and the allen key used to adjust the angle always falls out. Overall, a good tool, and I’m a fan of Makita tools in general.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Makita, love this Jigsaw (apparently the Brushless are terrible)
customer_reviews.text: This one is not terrible, operates just like a jigsaw should. Battery life is fine, don't worry about it. The tiny clear plastic piece (you'll see what I mean when you use it) comes off quickly and you can just toss it, it is not important at all. Besides that silly item, this jigsaw is a beast. I love the way it changes blades, super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Great Jigsaw for a hobby wood worker
customer_reviews.text: A great jigsaw. Its very powerful and seems to live up to the Makita brand. have yet to have a Makita fail me. It does suck the life out of a battery. It lasts for about half hour to forty minutes roughly. So it might be good to have more than one battery when doing a larger project. It is also heavy. But boy can it cut and it is fairly quiet
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Great cut but no blade storage.
customer_reviews.text: I have had corded varieties for a long time. Decided to purchase cordless. All my cordless are Makita. Excellent. My only grip with this one is no blade storage. No under the handle hole to keep spares. (If it's there I haven't found it.) But that is my only complaint. Nice straight lines and variable speed start up.
customer_reviews.author: ScottTENN

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Really like this saw. It is not brushless but the brushless saw has a trigger control that does not speed up until you meet some resistance. This saw allows you control the speed the saw from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Aword69

customer_reviews.title: Great Jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: Best cordless jigsaw I've used. The LED is actually awesome, makes it so much easier to see what you're cutting. Also, the speed is very easy to control which is very important when cutting with a jigsaw. Love this saw.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Deville

customer_reviews.title: Makita 18v lineup is the best and a super value
customer_reviews.text: I own at least 10 Makita 18v tools. None of them have disappointed. I have invested in this line with my business. Many prefer this older model jigsaw to the next version, which has slow start. I think the slow start is valuable on some tools, like the 3 1/4 hp 15 amp router, but on the jigsaw the slow start of the newer model can become a time waster.
customer_reviews.author: Craig D

customer_reviews.title: Full featured, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Has all the features I need. It is well built, easy to use and works great. I have had a couple of jig saws in the past. This one far surpasses either of them. Light weigh and battery power makes it very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H.

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to get use to.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this model a five but there are a couple of issues. No blower for dust (knew that going into it), and the blade seems to set back further than my older jig saw, so it’s a learning curve, and cutting takes time to get use too.
customer_reviews.author: Brianstl

customer_reviews.title: Best Jigsaw I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I love this saw. It is nice and heavy for stability but moves very easily on the material thanks to the plastic shoe. Overall it is very solid just feels great while cutting.. I will never go back to a corded jigsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Meurer Graphics

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: I use this several times a week to cut 1/8” aluminum, often with 1/4” extrusions. Have had no issues thus far and just ordered a second one for an employee to have in his truck. Worth noting there’s no battery included, but if you’re looking at this jigsaw you probably have other 18v LXT tools with batteries already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It feels good in my hand
customer_reviews.text: It cuts very well. The battery last longer than I need it too. It feels good in my hand. It has good visibility of the cut. The trigger controls the speed and just works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Used Product! Returned immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Received a used item with sawdust on it. The box was taped up and slightly damaged. Now I have to print off the labels, tape them to the box, and haul it to a UPS store. Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times already and am impressed. The battery packs last a good amount of time and the saw is fantastic! No worries about cutting power cords with this saw. Easy to transport and light-weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great too.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and it does not have the ANNOYING soft start that the brusheless units do. I do hope it was brusheless though..... as it does eat batteries for lunch a bit. But hey! You press it, and it cuts!!! No need to "feel resistance" crap!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Very easy to use and handle. The OEM blades come with it are very sharp. Works much better than my other jig saw. Highly recommended tool.
customer_reviews.author: Cobia

customer_reviews.title: Look Ma, no cord!
customer_reviews.text: I hate cords! I finally got tired of dragging the power cord of the saw across what ever I’m cutting. This saw works as well or better than any jig saw I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: R. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Great jigsaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model because there is no nanny button, just put the battery in and pull trigger. I have the corded version.
customer_reviews.author: Tod R Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but it was way too heavy for me to use, and loading.unloafing the blades was ridiculously awkward.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to use than my old corded Black & Decker.
customer_reviews.text: Balance feels right, and the handle is comfortable to hold & use. Battery attached with little effort. Blade change could not be much easier. LED light shines on your cut so you can see what you are doing. The Makita battery system is the same thru the entire Makita tool lineup. My battery will fit my other Makita tools, so it was a no brainer to get this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It's a Makita
customer_reviews.text: Makita is my favorite battery powered tool brand. This jig saw is no exception. Thanks Makita
customer_reviews.author: Blizzard

customer_reviews.title: Jig saw
customer_reviews.text: Cuts stuff as described. Right tool for the right job. works well with others also.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Use it and love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a broken electric model I had. It's wonderful. Power is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Bought the older model to avoid the auto speed.
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth, vibration free. Compared to my buddies Dewalt, way better! Cleaner cuts better dust clearing, and the led light! The light makes the biggest difference.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: This baby has plenty of power and frees me of ...
customer_reviews.text: This baby has plenty of power and frees me of having to drag a chord around.The trigger has smooth variable speed control. It takes the same bateries as my drill/driver set. All in all just a well built solid tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operator
customer_reviews.text: What a great took to add to my inventory. Super Easy to load the blade and to use in cutting. Makes corner cuts so easy and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cerda

customer_reviews.title: Makita Makes me Happy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tool ... easy blade change ....lighted cut line .... and works well their batteries I already have a ton of!
customer_reviews.author: Louis S. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Makita quality
customer_reviews.text: This tool is powerful and comes in handy with projects.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great but pricey
customer_reviews.text: What a great saw , works really better than I expected , thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Last long with 5.0 or 6.0 battery
customer_reviews.text: Great price , great tool, no cords, works well with 5.0 battery
customer_reviews.author: Robert Defrancisco

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Blades are easy to change and it powers through 2" pine easily. Not having a cord in the way is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: esb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Really happy with this line of Makita tools.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Like buttah!
customer_reviews.text: This baby provides you with a smooth, straight cut! No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good saw
customer_reviews.text: I love the XLT line and this little guy is great
customer_reviews.author: PghPaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality cordless tool
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, easy to handle and overall no cord in the middle of your cut. Excellent. Makita quality.
customer_reviews.author: recrujo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Saw
customer_reviews.text: Nice not to have the trailing cord especially for curvilinear cuts. Only weak spot is the plastic blade guide on the base that failed after about 2 cuts. I threw it away and it works fine without it.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool
customer_reviews.text: The portability and versatility of the this tool is unmatched. I especially love the fact that it's cordless and, for the most part, Brush Less. I would definitely recommend this tool to any professional or hobbyist.
customer_reviews.author: P. McGlashan

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Makita, I agree with with others positve ratings.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I tried going German with a well known and expensive cordless tool company. But I always ended up back using my Makita tools. Ever since I got a 7.2V drill and a flashlight years ago, something was special with Makita. Maybe it's their color, maybe the long standing fact that their tools are the best. Or it's the feeling I get picking up a Makita tool. So I decided to stick with this platform along with the latest LTX line. Everybody else seems to chase what Makita makes. I know Bosch is good, I just happen to stay with Makita. Just a choice that started out with my first Makita drill and Tourch Light.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N. Monti

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the arsenal
customer_reviews.text: Great jigsaw, works fantastic! not much to say, I already had Makita 18v tools. So adding this one made a lot of sense!
customer_reviews.author: Micheal A.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, goes well with the rest of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love Makita products. This one works as well as the others I have.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Steimling

customer_reviews.title: Says new, received used
customer_reviews.text: It's a good saw, good for things around the house. Low stars mainly because it was marketed as New, but the one I received was obviously used.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy guy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth the additional cost. No bouncing or vibrations that can make your cut go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: jjjjj

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Best cutting tool ever! Every man should have this in their tool arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: NFiltr8R996

customer_reviews.title: I finally got rid of the corded saw. Good tool.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and I have had no negative issues. I bought it to finally get rid of the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: As Good As It Gets
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. No WAY I could be happier for the purchase. A spectacularly great tool.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyB

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from 19.2 v craftsman to Makita LXT. It's a vast improvement. The jigsaw has way better control then the craftsman it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: top 4 tools one should own. Extremely versatile and lacks no power.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely handy and well made. Purchased all makita products and this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: brianc

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I want.
customer_reviews.text: This cordless will work with all your other Makita 18 V rechargeable batterIes! Exactly what I want.
customer_reviews.author: EKossick

customer_reviews.title: Saw works great
customer_reviews.text: It cuts extremely well, not too impressed with battery life, but that was stock makitas, I guess I could upgrade. Saw works great
customer_reviews.author: William K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this years ago. Performs well and can't beat the portability
customer_reviews.author: J. Henson

customer_reviews.title: A nice purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Glad that I go with non brushless version. The best thing is it made in England. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: Just received the tool and it appears used? Box was previously opened and repackaged. Tool is dirty and has wear marks on the base?
customer_reviews.author: Frank L.

customer_reviews.title: maybe new
customer_reviews.text: box was taped up some dirt on the tool look like been used before no cover plate on the battery slot but work fine
customer_reviews.author: Didier

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be built to last
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver. Met all my expectations from a makita tool.
customer_reviews.author: Pv

customer_reviews.title: get one
customer_reviews.text: love it as much power as my corded jig saw , with no cord hassle
customer_reviews.author: bill cummings

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: disappointed! Takes a great deal of battery power and does not have the power the reciprocation saw has. I was cutting 5/4 deck boards and batteries lasted about an hour? Just does not have the power I was expecting and hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor C.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this order so fast ! but it was used !!!!!!!!! dusty and open box !! it works !! but ( U S E D )
customer_reviews.author: tools buyer

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: this jig saw has a lot of power. I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: john lynn

customer_reviews.title: That it is  Corliss easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is a good tool. Works great use it a lot
customer_reviews.author: RalphRiojas

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The blade didn't sit in the roller guide. It also didn't come out at ninety degrees to the base. Adjusting the base is also a bit clumsy with a hex wrench. It's a shame I had to return it because everything else about it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Already have Makita batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool and compact enough for a powerful jig saw
customer_reviews.author: Hanmei

customer_reviews.title: He used it and said it worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very excited to receive this saw to go with the drills, sander, and circular saw. He used it and said it worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: ... tools for my boyfriend and he is crazy in love with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tools for my boyfriend and he is crazy in love with them!! A tip from him: no need to buy each tool with a battery. You really only need 2-4 total so the tools are much cheaper this way!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: No hassles it works great.
customer_reviews.text: As with all Makita cordless tools we use this thing constantly in the shop. No hassles it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Makita tool
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool and works better then my plug-in tool it replaced. Great to make cuts without a cord in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best deal by far.
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching everywhere for a cordless jigsaw with great reviews and I found it here. Seriously, you just can't beat this deal. Bonus: Love the bag with the handles and long carrying strap.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A. Lawrie

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've bought in a long time. Works like a champ and very comfortable in my hand. Super easy to change the blades. Came with three blades by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Dale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A year later and love it! Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saw is fine, tool less blade change is the key feature ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw is fine, tool less blade change is the key feature here. Plus Makita LXT compatibility. Otherwise I think these are too high priced compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Furman

customer_reviews.title: Good first impression
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I haven't used it much yet. So far, this saw seems to be solidly built, though it's pricey compared to some other alternatives. It includes an assortment of jigsaw blades, which is a bit of a nice extra these days. Instructions are not the most clear, especially when it comes to changing the blade, but I was able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: a-squared

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it . Works well. Weight is just right.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Another great Makita battery tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Fast becoming my favorite jug saw. Powerful and sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Griesshaber

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, just needs a light to be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, precision, and power but for this price Makita should put on board lights.
customer_reviews.author: Walnut

customer_reviews.title: Makita Quality
customer_reviews.text: This comes with 6 blades (2 course wood, 2 fine wood, 2 metal) Very easy to use. Appears to be high quality
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Freedom from the cord!
customer_reviews.text: None better... I doubt if I'll use my Bosch again except in emergency situations.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cordless tool Now I would love for makita to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cordless tool Now I would love for makita to make a coardless router
customer_reviews.author: Brett M.

product_meta.title: Makita XVJ03Z 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless Jig Saw, Tool Only
product_meta.description: Style:Bare ToolMakita's 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless Jig Saw seamlessly combines precision and power with the lowest overall weight in its class. The XVJ03Z has a range of precision and comfort features for precise jig saw cutting performance, including less vibration and lower noise for more control and comfort. Sold as Bare Tool Only
feature_bullets: Makita built variable speed motor delivers 0 to 2, 600 strokes per minute for fast and efficient cutting
3 Orbital settings plus straight cutting for use in a wide range of materials
"Tool less" Blade change system allows for faster blade installation and removal for increased productivity
Large 2 finger variable speed trigger for added convenience
Heavy gauge, precision machined base for smooth, accurate cutting and added durability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars396 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
